name: Vonage Dotnet Skeleton App
description: A Vonage Dotnet Skeleton App for validating your enviornment and account is setup

VONAGE_API_KEY.description: Find your account API key and secret on the dashboard https://dashboard.nexmo.com

VONAGE_API_SECRET.description: Find your account API key and secret on the dashboard https://dashboard.nexmo.com

ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT.description: Enviornment you want your ASP.NET core app deployed in - default set to 'Development' for this sample
